00105     //friend class SG_TreeFactory;
00106     
00107     struct greater
00108     {
00109         bool operator()(const SG_Tree *a, const SG_Tree *b)
00110         {
00111             return a->volume() > b->volume();
00112         }
00113     };
00114

00121 #endif
00122 };

00132 class SG_TreeFactory
